text: 中望3D概念
建模概念
装配概念
中望3D是一个强大易用的基于参数化特征的CAD程序，通过该程序，用户可快速直观地设计零件。线框、曲面和实体特征无缝地集成到零件模型中，为设计应用提供最佳的灵活性。
用中望3D设计零件时，有一个自然序列。包括使用基准平面、草图、外部参考来建立线框、曲面和实体特征。本节包含这些基本零件建模概念的综述。
基准概念
草图概念
外部参考概念
实体特征概念
曲面特征概念
线框特征概念
用户可以设计相同的方式“自底向上”或“由上而下”建立装配模型。无论是在哪一种情况下，装配体都是由建立到装配体内的组件或插入（引用）到装配体内的组件构成的。
当添加组件到装配体的时候，就会形成父/子关系。这些关系以图表的方式显示在装配树里。装配体通过对齐约束而在参数方面有一定的关联。组件应该如何放置在装配体层次结构之内以及如果其它组件被修改，该组件应该如何作出响应，这些相关的信息都包含在这些约束里。
通过允许用户把更多的命令应用到其它组件和子装配体（没有激活的），用户可以更容易地在装配的环境下进行工作。这些命令包括：查询命令、点命令、注释文本命令、基准面命令和阵列组件命令。通过在缩放时减少不必要的重绘和采用增强的显示管理方式，增强了大型装配的性能。
装配体模型包含比装配体组件更多信息。利用装配建模，用户可以在组件之间进行 干扰检查以及查询装配体的详细信息，如：质量属性数据。上图显示了一个基本的装配体，用于说明利用中望3D的“自底向上”和“由上而下”的设计方法。
自底向上装配设计
由上而下装配设计
predictions: Zhongwang 3D concept
Modeling concept
Assembly concept

ZW3D is a powerful and easy-to-use CAD program based on parametric features, through which users can quickly and intuitively design parts. Wireframe, surface, and solid features are seamlessly integrated into the part model, providing the best flexibility for design applications.

When using Creo Parametric to design parts, there is a natural sequence. It includes using datum planes, sketches, external references to create wireframes, surfaces, and solid features. This section contains an overview of these basic part modeling concepts.
Datum concept
Sketch concept
External reference concept
Concept of entity feature
Concept of surface feature
Wireframe feature concept

Users can design assembly models in the same way, either 'bottom-up' or 'top-down'. In either case, the assembly is composed of components built into the assembly or inserted (referenced) into the assembly.

When adding components to the assembly, a parent/child relationship is formed. These relationships are displayed in the assembly tree in a graphical manner. The assembly is parameterized through alignment constraints. Information on how components should be placed within the assembly hierarchy and how this component should respond if other components are modified is contained within these constraints.

By allowing users to apply more commands to other components and sub-assemblies (not activated), users can more easily work in the assembly environment. These commands include: query command, point command, annotation text command, datum plane command, and array component command. By reducing unnecessary redraws during zooming and adopting enhanced display management, the performance of large assemblies is enhanced.

The assembly model contains more information than the assembly components. With assembly modeling, users can perform interference checks between components and query detailed information of the assembly, such as: mass property data. The figure above shows a basic assembly to illustrate the 'bottom-up' and 'top-down' design methods using Creo Parametric.
Bottom-up assembly design
Top-down assembly design
reference: ZW3D Concepts
Modeling Concepts
Assembly Concepts

ZW3D is a powerful yet easy to use parametric feature-based CAD program that allows you to design parts quickly and intuitively. Wireframe, surface, and solid features are seamlessly integrated into the part model to provide optimum flexibility in design applications.

There is a natural sequence in which parts are designed with ZW3D. This includes the use of datum planes, sketches, and external references for creating wireframe, surface, and solid features. This section contains a review of these basic part modeling concepts.
Datum Concepts
Sketching Concepts
External Reference Concepts
Solid Feature Concepts
Surface Feature Concepts
Wireframe Feature Concepts

You can build assembly models the same way you design them - from the "bottom up" or from the "top down." In either case, the assembly is made up of components that are either created or inserted (instanced) into the assembly.

When components are added to an assembly, parent/child relationships are formed. These relationships are graphically displayed in an assembly tree. Components are parametrically related by alignment constraints. These constraints contain information about how a component should be positioned within the assembly hierarchy and how it should react if other components are modified.

Working within the context of an assembly is made easier by allowing you to apply more commands to other components and sub-assemblies (that are not active). These include the Inquire, Point, Annotation Text, Datum Plane and Pattern Component commands. Large assembly performance is enhanced by eliminating unnecessary redraws and enhanced display management while zooming.

Assembly models contain more information than simply the sum of their components. With assembly modeling you can perform interference checks between components and inquire assembly specific information such as mass properties data. The figure below shows a basic assembly and is used to illustrates the "bottom up" and "top down" design approaches with ZW3D.
Bottom Up Assembly Design
Top Down Assembly Design

text: 中望3D概念
视图工具
工具栏>图标（零件/草图/ 工程图/CAM 级）
使用该命令返回到一系列视图中的上一个视图。

Viewing Tools

Use this command to return to the previous view in a series of views.

text: 中望3D概念
零件剖面视图
剖面 开/关
必选输入
可选输入
选择输入（插入视图选项）
用于干扰项检查
中望3D支持剖面。这意味着你可以在某个零件上进行操作，同时也可以激活先前定义的切割平面。无论如何，零件的本身不会改变。只有零件的显示会受到影响。如果需要对 或 中不容易见到的零件的各个区域进行操作，这是非常方便的。
线框显示模式
消隐显示模式
此命令用于控制剖面视图开/关。
选择要显示的截面类型
通过平面显示截面。
通过两个切割面显示截面。
通过三个平面显示截面。
通过线框平面显示截面。
通过轮廓显示截面。
视图名称&插入视图 命名并保存截面视图。现在不止一个视图可以保存到视图管理器。通过管理器可以进行如下操作创建/删除/激活/重定义/重命名。
对齐平面利用该选项定义截面图的对齐方式。在默认的情况下，截面图与默认的XY平面对齐。可以选择任何基准面或平面。截面图将会与选定的平面对齐。
对齐平面1/对齐平面2/对齐平面3利用该选项定义截面图的对齐方式（通过3个平面截面）。在默认的情况下，截面图与默认的XY/XZ/YZ平面对齐。可以选择任何基准面或平面。截面图将会与选定的平面对齐。可去除勾选来隐藏选定截面，也可通过按钮反转剪切平面。
激活基准面 利用该选项切换每个截面图的显示。一直都有一个激活的截面图。通过选择一个图标（即按下图标），就可以激活平面。
激活上基准面。 激活前基准面。 激活右基准面。 激活左基准面。 激活后基准面。 激活下基准面。
偏移 对于平面显示截面和切割面显示截面（见上述的必选输入），利用该选项偏移与对齐平面对齐的截面图。
厚度 对于切割面的“剖面”，利用该选项定义切割面的厚度。
顶视图、前视图、右视图、左视图、后视图、底视图 对于线框平面的“截面”，利用这些选项定位线框平面的每个平面。
重置位置 利用该选项重置所有的平面至其默认的位置。
反转方向 利用该选项反转剪切平面。
轮廓 指定一个用来创建截面的闭合轮廓，可选择面、线框几何图形、面边界或一个草图。通过拉伸该轮廓来修剪相交的造型或组件。类似于拉伸命令中的减运算。
类型 指定拉伸的方式。
起始点、结束点 指定拉伸开始和结束位置。可输入精确的值，或在屏幕上拖动光标实时预览，也可通过单击右键显示额外的输入选项。
剖面造型 利用该选项可以确定被截掉部分的显示方式。从以下选项作出选择。
无不可见的截面形状。 截面线框形状。
干涉 指的是实体和组件交叉区域的颜色。
填充颜色 可设置填充颜色为实体颜色或自定义颜色。
填充样式 利用该选项定义覆盖物的类型，显示在零件的截面图上。选择以下选项的其中一种：
无覆盖。 填充覆盖。 栅格覆盖。
间距 如果选定“封口覆盖物”（见上），利用该选项定义图案的间距。
不透明 利用游标改变（零件上的）截面图的透明度。左边的透明度较低，右边的透明度较高。最右边，将会形成实体截面图。
对齐剖面 利用该选项，使用选定截面对齐视图。
显示干涉 勾选此框，将会显示实体和组件交叉区域。
显示剖面 勾选此框，将会显示剖面。否则将隐藏剖面。
显示手柄 勾选此框，将会显示手柄。否则将隐藏手柄。
非封闭造型显示填充 该选项对非封闭造型有效。勾选此框，非封闭造型会显示填充。
勾选该选项，可以调整手柄位置及坐标轴方向。
不勾选该选项，以手柄为参考坐标系，移动、复制或旋转实体。
仅显示剖面切片 勾选此框，将只显示剖面切片。
裁剪线框 勾选此框，将线框进行剖切。
显示剖面曲线 勾选此框，将会显示剖面曲线。
曲线颜色 此为剖面曲线的颜色。
线框 选择剖面曲线的线框值，包括：0.18mm、0.25mm、0.35mm、0.50mm、0.70mm和1.00mm。
插入基准面利用该选项，将基准面放在激活的截面图上以及截面图的中心。
插入曲线列表 利用该选项创建截面曲线，并将曲线放在激活的截面图上。
排除/包含 利用该选项用户可以选择不参与剖切的组件，也可以选择参与剖切的组件。
组件 利用该选项选择不参与/参与剖切的组件。
载入组件装配。
利用“拖动组件”命令，在活动范围内拖动组件到你想检查交叉点的位置。
执行该命令，并从“输入管理器”的设置干涉点的。
可选输入中
点击其中一个已显示的截面图，并将其拖动穿过装配体。如果在两个或多个组件之间找到干涉点，该干涉点就以指定的干涉点颜色显示。 参照下文中的例子。
步骤1：载入装配 步骤2:拖动组件 步骤3：预览交叉点
步骤1：载入装配
步骤2:拖动组件
步骤3：预览交叉点
predictions: Zhongwang 3D concept
Part section view
Profile On/Off
必选输入
Optional input
Select input (insert view option)
Interference check

ZWCAD 3D supports section. This means that you can operate on a part while activating a previously defined cutting plane. In any case, the part itself will not change. Only the display of the part will be affected. This is very convenient if you need to work on various areas of a part that are not easily visible.
Wireframe display mode
Hidden display mode
This command is used to control the opening/closing of the section view.
Select the type of section to display
Display the section through the plane.
Display the section through two cutting planes.
Display the section through three planes.
Display the section through wireframe plane.
Show section through profile.

View name & insert view Name and save the section view. Now more than one view can be saved to the view manager. The following operations can be performed through the manager: create/delete/activate/redefine/rename.

Align plane using this option to define the alignment of the section view. By default, the section view is aligned with the default XY plane. Any reference plane or plane can be selected. The section view will be aligned with the selected plane.

Align plane 1/Align plane 2/Align plane 3 use this option to define the alignment of the section view (through 3 planes). By default, the section view is aligned with the default XY/XZ/YZ planes. Any reference plane or plane can be selected. The section view will be aligned with the selected plane. Uncheck to hide the selected section, or use the button to reverse the cutting plane.

Activate the datum plane. Use this option to switch the display of each section view. There is always an active section view. By selecting an icon (i.e. pressing the icon), you can activate the plane.
Activate top datum plane. Activate front datum plane. Activate right datum plane. Activate left datum plane. Activate back datum plane. Activate bottom datum plane.
Offset, for the plane display section and the cutting plane display section (see the above mandatory input), use this option to offset the section diagram aligned with the aligned plane.
Thickness For the 'section' of the cutting surface, use this option to define the thickness of the cutting surface.
Top view, front view, right view, left view, back view, bottom view, for the wireframe plane 'section', use these options to locate each plane of the wireframe plane.
Reset position Use this option to reset all planes to their default positions.
Reverse direction Use this option to reverse the cutting plane.

Profile specifies a closed profile used to create a cross-section, which can be a face, wireframe geometry, face boundary, or a sketch. Extrude the profile to trim intersecting shapes or components. Similar to the subtract operation in the extrude command.
Type specifies the way of extrusion.

Specify the start and end points to specify the start and end positions of the extrusion. You can enter precise values, or drag the cursor on the screen for real-time preview, or right-click to display additional input options.
Profile shape This option can determine the display mode of the cut-off part. Choose from the following options.
Invisible section shape. Section wireframe shape.
Interference refers to the color of the intersecting area between entities and components.
Fill color can be set to solid color or custom color.
Fill style Use this option to define the type of overlay displayed on the section view of the part. Choose one of the following options:
No cover. Fill cover. Grid cover.
Spacing If 'closure cover' (see above) is selected, use this option to define the spacing of the pattern.

Change the opacity using the cursor to adjust the transparency of the (part's) cross-section view. The left side has lower transparency, and the right side has higher transparency. At the far right, a solid cross-section view will be formed.
Align section Using this option, align the view with the selected section.
Display Interference Check this box to display the intersection area of entities and components.
Display section Check this box to display the section. Otherwise, the section will be hidden.
Display handle. Check this box to display the handle. Otherwise, the handle will be hidden.
Non-closed shape display fill This option is effective for non-closed shapes. Check this box, non-closed shapes will display fill.
Check this option to adjust the handle position and coordinate axis direction.
Without checking this option, move, copy, or rotate entities with the handle as the reference coordinate system.
Only show section slice. Check this box to only display the section slice.
Trim wireframe Check this box to trim the wireframe.
Display section curve Check this box to display the section curve.
Curve color This is the color of the section curve.
Wireframe Select the wireframe values of the section curve, including: 0.18mm, 0.25mm, 0.35mm, 0.50mm, 0.70mm, and 1.00mm.
Insert the datum plane using this option, place the datum plane on the active section view and at the center of the section view.
Insert curve list Use this option to create section curves and place the curves on the active section view.
Exclude/Include This option allows users to select components that will not participate in the section, and also to select components that will participate in the section.
Component Use this option to select components that are not participating/participating in the sectioning.
Load component assembly.
Use the 'Drag Component' command to drag the component within the active range to the position where you want to check the intersection points.
Execute the command and set the interference points from the 'Input Manager'.
Optional input

Click on one of the displayed section views and drag it through the assembly. If there is an interference point between two or more components, the interference point will be displayed in the specified interference point color. Refer to the example in the following text.
Step 1: Load assembly Step 2: Drag component Step 3: Preview intersection point
Step 1: Load the assembly
Step 2: Drag the component
Step 3: Preview the intersection point
reference: ZW3D Concepts
Part Section Views
Section On/Off
Required Inputs
Optional Inputs
Optional Inputs (Insert View Option)
for Interference Checking

ZW3D supports a Section View. This means that you can work on a part while previously defined cutting planes are active. The part is not physically altered in any way. Only the display of the part is affected. This is very convenient when you need to work on areas of a part that are not readily visible in or.
Wireframe Display Mode
Hidden Line Display Mode
Use this command to control Section On/Off.
Select the type of section to display.
Display a section at a single plane.
Display a slice section at two planes.
Display a section with three planes.
Display a section with an envelope encompassing 6 individual section planes.
Display a section with a profile.

View name & Insert View Name and save section view. Now more than one section view can be saved into view manager. Through the manager, some operations, such as create/delete/activate/redefine/rename.This is the same as selecting the New option from the View Manager. can be apply to the view.You can store the current layer visibility and current section plane along with the saved view. All parameters of this command are stored with the view. If you save multiple section views, they can all have different slices, offsets, inference colors, cross hatching, hatch spacing, etc.

Align plane Use this option to define the alignment of the section planes. By default, the section planes are aligned with the default XY plane. You can select any datum plane or planar face. The section planes will align with the selected plane.

Align plane1/Align plane2/Align plane3 Use this option to define the alignment of the section planes (for Section with 3 plans). By default, the section planes are aligned with the default XY/XZ/YZ plane. You can select any datum plane or planar face. The section planes will align with the selected plane. You can also remove the check disable the selected section plane. Click the icon to reverse the clip plane.
Plane activation Use this option to toggle the display of each section plane. There is always an active section plane. By selecting an icon (i.e., it is depressed), that plane is activated.
Activate top plane. Activate front plane. Activate right plane. Activate left plane. Activate back plane. Activate bottom plane.
Offset For Section at plane and Section with slice (see Required Inputs above), use this option to offset the section plane relative to the alignment plane.
Thickness For Section with slice use this option to define the slice thickness.
Top, Front, Right, Left, Back, Bottom For Section with envelope, use these options to locate each plane of the envelope.
Reset position Use this option to reset all planes to their default locations.
Reverse direction Use this option to reverse the clip plane.

Profile Select a closed profile to create a section. You can select face, wireframe geometry, face edges or a sketch. Extrude the selected profile to cut the overlapped portion of the base part or assembly. This section mode is similar to the Extrude command with the remove boolean operation.

Type Specify the extrude type from the following. 1 side The start position is decided by the selected Profile, and to specify the End position to determine the extrude length. 2 sides Specify the Start and End positions to determine the extrude length. Symmetrical This type is similar to the "1 Side", but it will extrude the same length along the opposite direction decided by the End position.
Start, End Specify the start and end of the extruded profile. You can enter the exact values, drag the preview echo on the screen or right-click for additional input options.
Sectioned shape Use this option to decide how to display the portion of the part that is sectioned away. Select from the following.
Make the sectioned shape invisible. Display the sectioned shape as Wireframe geometry.
Interference This is the color of the area of intersecting between shape/components.
Hatch color Show section color with Body color or Specify color.
Hatch style Use this option to define the type of cap overlay to display on the part section plane. Select one of the following.
Do not display a cap overlay. Display a hatch pattern for the cap overlay. Display a grid pattern for the cap overlay.
Spacing If a Cap overlay is selected (see above), use this option to define the pattern spacing.
Opaque Use the slider to change the transparency of the section plane (on the part). Left is less transparent and right is more. Al the way to the right will result in a solid section plane.
Align with section plane Use this option to align view with selected section plane.
Display interference Place a check in this box if you want the area of intersecting between shape/components displayed.
Display section planes Place a check in this box if you want the section planes displayed. Remove the check to hide them.
Display handle Place a check in this box if you want the handle displayed. Remove the check to hide it.
Display hatch for non-closed shapes This option is only valid for non-closed shapes. Check this box to display hatch for non-closed shapes.
When this box is checked, you can adjust the handle position and direction.
When this box is unchecked, you can move, copy or rotate entities by using handle.
Display section slice only Check this box if you want only the section slice displayed.
Clip wireframe Check this box if you want to section the wireframe.
Display section curves Check in this box if you want the section curves displayed.
Curve color This is the color of the section curves.
Line width Select a value as the line width of the section curves including 0.18mm, 0.25mm, 0.35mm, 0.50mm, 0.70mm and 1.00mm.
Insert datum Use this option to place a datum plane on and at the center of the active section plane.
Insert curves Use this option to create section curves and place them on the active section plane.
Exclude/Include Use this option to allow users to specify which components are sectioned.
Component Use this option to select the components you want to exclude/include the section.
Load a component assembly.
Use the Drag Component command to drag a component through its range of motion to a location where you want to check for an intersection.
Execute this command and set the of intersection from the section of the Input Manager.
Optional Input

Click on one of the displayed section planes and drag it through the assembly. If an intersection among two or more components is found, it will be displayed in the intersection color you specified. Refer to the example shown below.
Step 1: Load Assembly Step 2: Drag Component Step 3: Preview Intersection
Step 1: Load Assembly
Step 2: Drag Component
Step 3: Preview Intersection

text: 中望3D文件级
文件菜单
最多可在文件菜单的底部列出10个已打开的文件。第11个文件将放置到列表第一个文件的位置，依此类推。可从列表中选择一个文件并显示。
如果用户忘记了已经打开某个文件并使用打开文件按钮再次打开该文件，系统将会提示用户该文件已经打开，并且询问用户是否要重载原来的文件，通常选择否，中望3D将重新打开那个已激活的文件。
文件名 选择所需打开/输入的文件名。
文件类型 指定输入的文件类型。
文件描述 显示文件的描述。该描述在创建该文件时，可以在零件属性的“文件描述”中定义。
本地复制 勾选此项，文件复制到本地。
加载选项 用户可以选择以加载上次保存，全部加载及部分加载的形式加载装配文件。
根对象 输入根对象进行搜索。
打开/开启只读 打开文件。如果选择“开启只读”模式，可以防止对已有模型进行误操作。以只读方式打开文件后，可以对装配体进行编辑操作，但是无法保存。其子装配可以编辑保存。
更新视图 用于设置文件显示方式，包括详细信息、列表和缩略图。
显示预览窗格 用于预览选中的ZW3D的文件。
快速过滤器 用于快速过滤ZW3D特定类型的文件，包括零件、装配、工程图、加工方案及Z3。
激活文件夹 当前激活路径。右键菜单支持打开、打开源文件夹、剪切、复制、删除、重命名、设置快速访问目录及设置工作目录。其中选择设置快速访问目录后，该文件夹将列举在左菜单中；如果文件夹设置为工作目录，打开工作目录可直接进入该文件夹。
保存文件夹 在文件中保存的文件路径。
搜索文件夹 在中望3D搜索路径面板中列出的路径。
激活路径及其子文件夹 当前激活路径以及其子文件夹。
我的文件/工作目录/桌面/我的电脑 打开文件界面左菜单提供我的文件/工作目录/桌面/我的电脑快捷文件夹功能。
predictions: Chunwang 3D file level
File menu

Up to 10 open files can be listed at the bottom of the File menu. The 11th file will be placed in the position of the first file in the list, and so on. You can select a file from the list and display it.

If the user forgets that a file is already open and uses the open file button to open the file again, the system will prompt the user that the file is already open and ask if the user wants to reload the original file. Usually choose 'no', and 中望3D will reopen the activated file.
File name Select the file name to be opened/entered.
File type specifies the input file type.
File description Display the description of the file. The description can be defined in the 'File Description' of the part properties when creating the file.
Local copy Check this option to copy the file to the local.
Loading options: Users can choose to load assembly files in the form of loading last saved, loading all, or loading partially.
Root object Enter the root object to search.

Open the file in read-only mode. If you choose to open in read-only mode, it can prevent accidental modifications to existing models. After opening the file in read-only mode, you can edit the assembly, but you cannot save it. Its sub-assemblies can be edited and saved.
Update view is used to set the file display mode, including detailed information, list, and thumbnails.
Display the preview pane to preview the selected ZW3D file.
Quick filter is used to quickly filter specific types of files in ZW3D, including parts, assemblies, engineering drawings, machining plans, and Z3.

Activate folder. The current activation path. Right-click menu supports open, open source folder, cut, copy, delete, rename, set quick access directory and set working directory. After selecting set quick access directory, the folder will be listed in the left menu; if the folder is set as the working directory, opening the working directory will directly enter the folder.
Save folder The file path where the file is saved in the file.
Search folder in the list of paths in the ZW3D search path panel.
Activate the current path and its subfolders. Current activation path and its subfolders.
My file / working directory / desktop / my computer open file interface left menu provides my file / working directory / desktop / my computer shortcut folder function.
reference: ZW3D File Level
File

Up to ten currently opened files are listed at the bottom of the File Menu for easy access. The eleventh file opened will replace the first file on the list and so on. Select a file from the list to display it.

If you forget that a file is already opened and you try to Open the file again, you will be reminded that the file is already opened and asked if you want to reload the original. The usual response should be No and ZW3D will reopen the active one.
File Name Select the file name to open or input.
File Type Specify the type of file.
File description Display the file description which can be defined in "File description" of part properties while creating the file.
Local copy Check this option to copy the file in the local.
Loading options Support last saved loading, full loading and partially loading.

Open/Open read-only Open the file. If you select Open read-only mode, you can prevent misoperations on existing models. After the file is opened in read-only mode, the assembly can be edited but cannot be saved. Sub-assemblies (or components) can be edited and saved.
Root object Input the root object to search files.
Change your view Select the display way of directories including Detaisl, List and Thumbnail.
Show the preview pane Use this icon to preview the selected ZW3D files.
Quick filter Filter the specific ZW3D files including part, assembly, drawing, CAM and Z3.

From active folder Check this option to activate current path. The context menu supports to Open, Cut, Copy, Delete, Rename, Set quick directory and Set working directory. If Set quick directory, the directory will be listed on the left bar; if Set working directory, the directory cann be opened in Working Folder.
From saved folder Select a file path saved in a file.
From search folders Select the paths that listed in the search path panel. If check this option, Auto Search in ZW3D Search Paths will be enabled at the same time.
From active & its sub-folders Select the current activated path and its sub-folders.
My Files/Working Folder/Desk/My Computer Open file UI supports the shortcut folders of My Files, Working Folder, Desk and My Computer.

text: 中望3D基础
快速定制
Ribbon栏显示与隐藏
Ribbon选项卡显示与隐藏
Ribbon面板显示与隐藏
Ribbon按钮显示与隐藏
Ribbon按钮大小及提示
自定义Ribbon栏
Ribbon栏默认显示位置为主窗口的上方。它有5个层级，从上到下分别是：Ribbon栏、Ribbon选项卡、Ribbon面板、Ribbon按钮、Ribbon按钮下拉菜单。激活的Ribbon栏，会随着当前激活的中望3D级别改变。使用Ribbon栏可以将工具栏按钮集中起来使用，从而为图形区域节省空间。
Ribbon栏默认为显示状态。
右键单击Ribbon选项卡空白处，在Ribbon外观的菜单中勾选或不勾选显示Ribbon栏。
点击Ribbon栏右上角的最小化Ribbon栏按钮 ，也可以切换Ribbon栏的显示状态。
右键单击Ribbon选项卡空白处，选择Ribbon选项卡，勾选或不勾选复选框以显示或隐藏Ribbon选项卡。
右键单击Ribbon选项卡空白处，选择Ribbon面板，勾选或不勾选复选框以显示或隐藏Ribbon栏面板。
右键单击要隐藏的按钮，选择隐藏。
右键单击面板，选择条目，勾选或不勾选复选框以显示或隐藏所在面板的多个按钮。
Ribbon栏中的命令按钮支持大小图标混排，右键单击要修改的按钮，选择大图标或小图标，可更改按钮大小。
右键单击Ribbon面板，将该面板内的所有按钮都设为大图标或小图标，也可以选择由系统来自动调整图标大小。
右键单击Ribbon选项卡空白处，在Ribbon外观的菜单中勾选或不勾选文字开，可显示或隐藏按钮的注释文字。默认为显示注释文字。
右键单击Ribbon选项卡空白处，选择，打开，可对Ribbon栏及其所包含的各种元素自行进行定制，包括增加、删除、编辑、显示与隐藏以及顺序调整等操作。
界面定制管理器
predictions: ZWCAD 3D Basics
Quick customization
Ribbon bar display and hide
Ribbon tab display and hide
Ribbon panel display and hide
Ribbon button display and hide
Ribbon button size and tooltip
Customize Ribbon Bar

The default display position of the Ribbon bar is above the main window. It has 5 levels, from top to bottom: Ribbon bar, Ribbon tab, Ribbon panel, Ribbon button, Ribbon button dropdown menu. The activated Ribbon bar will change according to the current activated MicroStation 3D level. Using the Ribbon bar can centralize the toolbar buttons for use, thus saving space in the graphics area.
The Ribbon bar is in the default display state.
Right-click on the blank area of the Ribbon tab, and check or uncheck the display of the Ribbon bar in the Ribbon Appearance menu.
Click the minimize Ribbon bar button at the top right of the Ribbon bar, or switch the display status of the Ribbon bar.
Right-click on the blank area of the Ribbon tab, select Ribbon tab, check or uncheck the checkbox to show or hide the Ribbon tab.
Right-click on the blank area of the Ribbon tab, select Ribbon panel, check or uncheck the checkbox to show or hide the Ribbon bar panel.
Right-click the button to be hidden, and select Blank.
Right-click on the panel, select items, check or uncheck the checkbox to show or hide multiple buttons on the panel.
The command buttons in the Ribbon bar support mixed large and small icons. Right-click the button to be modified, select Large Icon or Small Icon, and change the button size.
Right-click the Ribbon panel to set all the buttons inside the panel to large icons or small icons, or choose to let the system automatically adjust the icon size.

Right-click on a blank area of the Ribbon tab, check or uncheck the 'Text' option in the Ribbon Appearance menu to show or hide the annotation text of the buttons. The annotation text is displayed by default.

Right-click on the blank area of the Ribbon tab, select 'Open', and you can customize the Ribbon bar and its various elements by yourself, including adding, deleting, editing, showing and hiding, and adjusting the order.
Interface Customization Manager
reference: ZW3D Basics
Rapid Customization
Ribbon
Ribbon Tab
Ribbon Panel
Ribbon Button
Ribbon Button size and hints
Customize

The Ribbon located at the top of the Graphics Window. There are five levels of the Ribbon, which from top to bottom are Ribbon, Ribbon Tab, Ribbon Panel, Ribbon Button and pull-down menu of Ribbon button. The Ribbons vary according to the ZW3D level which is activated.
The Ribbon are visible by default.
Right-click the blank of ribbon tab and check or uncheck the Show Ribbon from the Ribbon Appearance menu.
Click the button to minimize the ribbon on the top-right of ribbon.
Right-click on the blank of ribbon tab and select Ribbon Tab. Then check or uncheck the tab you want to show or hide.
Right-click on the blank of ribbon tab and select Ribbon Panel. Then check or uncheck the panel you want to show or hide.
Right-click on a button and select Hide to hide it.
Right-click the blank of ribbon panel and select Items, you can hide/show multiple commands at the same time.
The Ribbon support large ICONS and small ICONS mixed arrangement. Right-click on a ribbon button and select Large Icon or Small Icon to change the button size.
Right-click the ribbon panel to set all the button within this panel to large icon or small icon. Or Auto Adjust icon by ZW3D.
Right-click the blank of ribbon tab and check/uncheck the Text on to display/hidden ribbon button hints from the Ribbon Appearance.
Right-click the blank of ribbon tab, and choose Customize to open the . You can add, delete, modify Ribbon Tab and Button, or adjust the order, etc.
Customize Settings Form

text: 中望3D建模
装配设计
工具
与装配剪切类似，“装配圆角/倒角”是另一个在装配中对组件形状进行修改的命令。保持了零件圆角/倒角特征的大部分圆角/倒角类型，但是一些高级特性未包含，比如，可变半径圆角，椭圆圆角，不对称倒角。该修改仅存在当前装配当中，不会影响组件的原始形状。参数设置可参考或。
圆角特征
倒角特征
组件继承该特征 勾选该选项，该特征将被组件继承。把装配特征传递到组件中，在组件中会创建相应的历史特征。在组件中生成的本地特征是被继承过来的，即不能被编辑、删除，可以选择保持关联关系或解除关联关系。
predictions: Zhongwang 3D modeling
Assembly design
tool

Similar to assembly trim, 'assembly fillet/chamfer' is another command to modify the shape of components in the assembly. It retains most types of part fillet/chamfer features, but some advanced features are not included, such as variable radius fillet, elliptical fillet, and asymmetric chamfer. This modification only exists within the current assembly and will not affect the original shape of the component. Parameter settings can refer to or.
Fillet feature
Chamfer feature

The component inherits this feature. Check this option, and the feature will be inherited by the component. Pass the assembly feature to the component, and the corresponding historical feature will be created in the component. The local features generated in the component are inherited and cannot be edited or deleted. You can choose to maintain the associative relationship or break the associative relationship.
reference: ZW3D Modeling
Assembly Design
Tools

Just like the “Assembly Cut", this command is another tool to remove material from picked components. keep most fillet/chamfer types that same as the"fillet/chamfer Feature" in part, But some advanced feature in the Part mode is not fulfilled. For example, the variable radius Fillet, the ellipse Fillet,Asymmetric Chamfer. and it can only exists within the assembly, which will not affect any original modeling course of the picked components.See or for options in this command.
Fillet Feature
Chamfer Feature

Propagate feature to components Check this option and the feature will be inherited by the component. Assembly features are passed to the component, where the corresponding history features are created. Local features generated in components are inherited, that is, cannot be edited, deleted, and can be kept or disassociated.

text: > > > > 选择边
中望3D基础
选择&选择过滤器
选择
选择边
选择边命令选择相互连接的边。该命令提供了多种方法来选择由边组成的特定特征，比如相切，相连等。
单边 查找单条边。
相切边 查找与种子边相切的相邻边。
连接边 查找与种子边相连的边。
特征边 查找基于特征自动选择边。
顶点边 查找以点为公共顶点的边。例如，在拾取五角星的中心顶点，系统会自动选择顶点上所有的边。
面边 通过选择面来选中面上的边。具体操作是选中一个面，系统会自动基于规则选中面上的边。点击“规则拾取设置”，弹出“面边设置”面板，提供三种选项：“全部”、“内环”、“外环”。如下图中高亮显示选中部分：
全部 内环 外环
全部
内环
外环
造型边 选择一条边，系统会自动把该边所在的造型上的所有边选中。
选择集 选择集创建后，在管理器中显示，可对已有的选择集进行选择。
predictions: Select edge
ZWCAD 3D Basics
Select & selection filter
select
Select edge
The Select Edge command selects the connected edges. The command provides various methods to select specific features composed of edges, such as tangent, connected, etc.
Single side Find a single edge.
Find the adjacent edges that are tangent to the seed edge.
Connect edges Find the edges connected to the seed edge.
Feature edge Find edges automatically based on features.
Vertex Edge Find the edges with the point as the common vertex. For example, when picking the central vertex of a pentagram, the system will automatically select all the edges on the vertex.

Face Edge selects the edges on the face by selecting a face. The specific operation is to select a face, and the system will automatically select the edges on the face based on the rules. Click 'Rule Pick Settings' to pop up the 'Face Edge Settings' panel, which provides three options: 'All', 'Inner Loop', 'Outer Loop'. The selected part is highlighted as shown in the figure below:
All inner loop outer loop
all
inner ring
outer ring
Shape Edge Select a edge, the system will automatically select all the edges on the shape where the edge is located.
Selection set After the selection set is created, it will be displayed in the manager, and existing selection sets can be selected.
reference: > > > > Pick Edges
ZW3D Basics
Picking & Pick Filters
Picking
Pick Edges
Use Pick Edges to select connected groups of edges. In ZW3D, it provides several methods for selecting edge regions that form certain kinds of features, such as tangent, connect, feature edges.
Single Edge Find the a single edge.
Tangent Edges Find the adjacent edges which are tangent to the seed.
Connect Edges Find the edges which are connected with the seed.
Feature Edges Find the edges that share the same feature with the seed.
Vertex Edges Find the surfaces whose radius is equal to the seed’s radius. The cylindrical surface and the sphere can be used as a seed.

Face Edges Find the edges that are on the selected face. Select a face first and the system will automatically select the edges according to the rule setting. Click "Rule Pick Setting" and select "All", "Inner", or "Outer" option in Face Edges Settings. The picked edges are highlight as the following figures:
All Inner Outer
All
Inner
Outer
Shape Edges Select an edge and the system will automatically select all edges that are on the same shape.
Pick Set After creating Pick Set, display in the manager. User can select the existing pick set.

text: 中望3D建模
管道设计
修改
使用此命令快速创建相同走向的管路。
必选输入
对齐坐标复制管路选择需要复制的管路，通过绘图区域的手柄，以拖拽的方式对齐到对应位置。 注意：使用“仅移动手柄”时，需要取消“仅移动手柄”后再移动一次，否则复制的模型保留在移动手柄前的位置。
点到点复制管路选择需要复制的管路，通过起始点为基准点，在目标点放置复制的管路。
组件选择需要复制的管路组件。
自动选择中段勾选该项可以帮助更快的选择目标组件，通过选择管路的首部和尾部，即可自动选择中间部分。
仅移动手柄勾选该项，控制手柄移动。
勾选该选项，可以调整手柄位置及坐标轴方向。
不勾选该选项，以手柄为参考坐标系，移动、复制或旋转实体。
位置 指的是手柄的原点。单击左键点击原点，手柄原点呈高亮显示，在实体的目标位置单击，调整手柄位置或移动、复制实体。
X，Y，Z轴 指的是手柄方向，默认为所选实体的坐标轴方向。选定需要调整的手柄坐标轴，被选中的坐标轴呈高亮显示，拖动坐标轴至目的方向。
起始点选择复制的起始点位置。
目标点选择复制管路起始点放置的位置。
predictions: Zhongwang 3D modeling
pipeline design
modify
Use this command to quickly create pipelines with the same direction.
必选输入

Align the coordinate and copy the pipeline. Select the pipeline that needs to be copied, and align it to the corresponding position by dragging the handle in the drawing area. Note: When using 'move handle only', you need to cancel 'move handle only' and then move it again, otherwise the copied model will remain in the position before moving the handle.
Copy the pipeline from point to point. Select the pipeline to be copied, use the starting point as the reference point, and place the copied pipeline at the target point.
Select the component to be copied for the pipeline component.
Automatically selecting the middle section can help to quickly select the target component. By selecting the beginning and end of the pipeline, the middle section can be automatically selected.
Only check the option to move the handle, and control the handle movement.
Check this option to adjust the handle position and coordinate axis direction.
Without checking this option, move, copy, or rotate entities with the handle as the reference coordinate system.

Position refers to the origin of the handle. Click the origin with the left mouse button, the handle origin will be highlighted, click the target position of the entity, adjust the handle position or move and copy the entity.

X, Y, Z axes refer to the direction of the handle, defaulting to the coordinate axis direction of the selected entity. Select the handle coordinate axis that needs to be adjusted, the selected axis will be highlighted, and drag the axis to the desired direction.
Select the starting point to copy the starting point position.
Select the target point to place the copied pipeline starting point position.
reference: ZW3D Modeling
Piping Design
Modify
Use this command to fast create pipes with the same flow direction.
Required Inputs

Copy pipes by aligning framesSelect pipes to copy. You can align the pipes to specified position through dragging the handle in the drawing area. Note: when "Move handle only" is checked, you need to cancel "Move handle only" and move again; Otherwise, the replicated model remains in the position before moving the handle.
Copy pipes from point to pointSelect pipes to copy. You can place the copied pipes at the target point through taking the starting point as the datum point.
ComponentSelect pipe component to copy.
Select intermediate automaticallyCheck this box to quickly select target component. It can automatically select the intermediate segement through selecting the start and end of pipes.
Move handle onlySelect pipe component to copy.
When this box is checked, you can adjust the handle position and direction.
When this box is unchecked, you can move, copy or rotate entities by using handle.
Position It refers to the handle origin. Click the handle origin, it will be highlight, then click the target position，You can adjust the handle position or move, copy, rotate entities.
X, Y, Z Axis It refers to the handle direction. Select the axis to adjust, and the selected axis will be highlight, then drag the axis to destination.
From pointSelect the position of starting point to copy.
To point(s)Select the position to place the starting point of pipes.

text: 中望3D建模
零件设计
特征
使用此命令，基于两个偏移距离沿所选边创建一个唇缘特征。必选输入包括创建特征的面边和偏移1、2。可以持续选择边和输入偏移量，直到完成所需的唇缘特征。
边 E 选择应用唇缘特征的边。
偏移1 D1 指定第一个偏移距离。唇缘偏移值的正负（+/-）是由相对于面的法向来定的。凸边上仅支持-/-偏移值，凹边上仅支持+/+偏置值。
偏移2 D2 指定第二个偏移距离。
predictions: Zhongwang 3D modeling
Part design
Feature

Using this command, create a fillet feature based on two offset distances along the selected edge. Required inputs include the face edge for creating the feature and offsets 1 and 2. You can continue to select edges and input offset distances until the desired fillet feature is completed.
Select edge E to apply the lip feature.

Offset 1 D1 specifies the first offset distance. The positive/negative (+/-) of the lip offset value is determined by the normal to the face. Only negative (-) offset values are supported on convex edges, and only positive (+) offset values are supported on concave edges.
Offset 2 D2 specifies the second offset distance.
reference: ZW3D Modeling
Part Design
Features

Use this command to create a constant lip feature along selected edges based on two offset distances. The required inputs include the face edges to feature and the 1st and 2nd offsets. You can continue to select edges and enter offsets until you complete the desired lip feature.
Edges Select the edge to apply the lip feature to.

1st offset Specify the first offset distance. Lip setback distances are +/- relative to the face normal. Only -/- setback lips on convex edges and +/+ offset lips on concave edges are supported at this time.
2nd offset Specify the second offset distance.

text: 中望3D建模
零件渲染
使用这个命令，创建一个图形窗口的渲染的图像，并在渲染窗口中显示。中望3D支持来创建逼真的渲染场景。使用设置渲染图像的大小和其他属性。如果需要的话，在渲染之前使用应用纹理映射。
Pov-Ray免费软件高级渲染引擎
渲染属性对话框
纹理属性对话框
Johnstone Safety Products使用中望3D CAD/CAM设计制造的工业桶
predictions: Zhongwang 3D modeling
Part rendering

Use this command to create a rendered image of a graphic window and display it in the rendering window. ZW3D supports creating realistic rendering scenes. Use it to set the size and other properties of the rendering image. If necessary, apply texture mapping before rendering.
Pov-Ray free software advanced rendering engine
Rendering Attribute Dialog Box
Texture attribute dialog
Johnstone Safety Products uses 3D CAD/CAM design and manufacturing for industrial barrels
reference: ZW3D Modeling
Part Rendering

Use this command to create a rendered image of the graphics window and displays it in the rendering window, to a file, or both. ZW3D supports the to create realistic rendered scenes. Use the to set the size and other attributes of the rendered image. Use the to apply texture maps to faces before rendering if desired.
Pov-Ray freeware advanced rendering engine
Rendering Attributes Form
Texture Attributes Form
Industrial bucket designed and manufactured by Johnstone Safety Products using ZW3D CAD/CAM

text: 中望3D工程图
编辑标注
在工程图级使用该命令，可修改标注的文本。该命令可用用户文本代替标注值。请参看使用嵌入文本变量，了解如何嵌入零件属性数据和其它变量文本。.
实体 选择要修改的标注。
文字 应与下面给出的用户文本选项配合使用。输入新的标注文本。
用户文本 选择用户文本，将新的标注文本输入到上面的文字字段，或点击鼠标右键打开输入选项菜单，选择编辑器。如果该标注为用户文本类型，文本会显示在文字字段（或文字和标注编辑器）中，用于修改。
predictions: Chamfer 3D Drawing Sheet
Edit annotation

Using this command at the drawing sheet level allows you to modify the text of the annotations. This command can use user text to replace the annotation values. Please refer to the use of embedded text variables to learn how to embed part attribute data and other variable text.
Entity Select the annotation to be modified.
Text should be used in conjunction with the user text options given below. Enter new annotation text.

Select the user text, enter the new annotation text into the above text field, or right-click to open the input options menu and select Editor. If the annotation is of user text type, the text will be displayed in the text field (or text and annotation editor) for modification.
reference: ZW3D Drafting
Editing Dimensions

Use this command at the Drawing Sheet Level to modify a dimension's text string. This command replaces the dimension value with user text. See Using Embedded Text Variables to learn how you can embed part attribute data and other variables text strings.
Entity Select the dimension to modify.
Text Used with the User Text option below. Enter the new dimension text.

User Text If this is, enter the new dimension text in the Text field above or right-click and select Editor from the Input Options Menu. If the dimension is currently user text, the text string will be displayed in the Text field (or the Text and Dimension Editor) for modification.

text: 中望3D制造 (CAM)
生成刀轨
CAM策略
2轴智能孔加工
该对话框用于定义智能铰孔工序的若干策略。策略指的是允许的加工公差。
上偏差孔大小量度（比如直径、深度等）的允许正公差。
下偏差 孔大小量度的允许负公差。
表面精度 允许的孔表面精加工公差。
圆度公差允许的孔圆度公差。
圆柱度公差允许的孔圆柱度公差。
predictions: 中望3D制造 (CAM)
generate tool path
CAM strategy
2-axis intelligent hole processing
This dialog is used to define several strategies for the intelligent hinge hole operation. Strategies refer to the allowed machining tolerances.
Allowable positive tolerance for measuring the size of the upper deviation hole (such as diameter, depth, etc.).
The lower deviation is the allowable negative tolerance for hole size measurement.
Surface accuracy allowed hole surface finish tolerance.
Roundness tolerance allowed for hole roundness tolerance.
The cylindrical tolerance allows for hole cylindrical tolerance.
reference: ZW3D Manufacturing (CAM)
Generating Toolpaths
CAM Tactics
Mill2 Hole Tactic
Use this form to define the rules for intelligent reaming operations. These refer to the allowable machining tolerances.
Tol + Possible The allowable positive tolerance for hole size dimensions, like diameters, depth.
Tol - Possible The allowable negative tolerance for hole size dimensions.
Finish Possible The allowable hole surface finish tolerance.
Circularity Possible The allowable hole circularity tolerance.
Cylindricity Possible The allowable hole cylindricity tolerance.

text: 中望3D应用
中望3D PDM
在设计的整个生命周期中，中望3D PDM管理器可以搜索和管理中望3D对象文件，以及其他非中望3D文件，如：文字处理、数据库和与设计项目关联的电子表格。也可以使用中望3D PDM管理器使用产品生命周期功能（如：检入、检出、发布等），和设置用户和组权限。
当前目录 使用下拉列表在数据数据库目录和用户目录之间切换。在当前目录上执行文件搜索。
文件过滤器 过滤当前数据库目录（或用户目录）；在文件过滤器对话框中输入过滤条件（见下文）。中望3D PDM管理器将定位并列出那些匹配所有字段的文件。
文件列表在此列出文件搜索的结果。如果没有输入搜索条件，将列出所有文件。
修订列表 在此列出选中文件的修订历史。每个修订表示一个列在文件列表中的文件。可通过从修订列表中选择一个修订级别，来选中文件列表中的一个文件。也可以使用此列表查看一个文件的修订历史。可以在选中的文件上执行对象编辑。更多信息参见鼠标按键功能 。
状态列表 该列表显示选中文件的当前状态（如：新建、检入、检出、发布或废弃）。同时也列出用户和组名称以及他们对此文件的访问权限。更多信息，参见修改文件的发布状态和修改中望3D用户和组权限。
预览 在此显示文件的预览。当使用保存文件、另存为、保存全部和保存/关闭文件命令时，自动创建一个预览。
文件列表 在一个文件上单击鼠标右键，显示下列对象编辑功能。根据文件的当前状态，有些功能被禁用了。
检入 检出 发布 新建发布 废弃 查看文件 复制文件 删除文件
状态列表 在一个条目上单击鼠标右键，并选择“修改状态”显示修改文件状态对话框。修改该文件的状态或用户与组的权限。更多信息，参见修改文件的发布状态和修改中望3D用户和组权限。
使用此对话框过滤文件列表（见上文）。如果正在查看一个文件，且知道该文件名，那么仅输入文件名字段即可。如果知道文件版本或用户名，只要输入相应字段即可。如果不确定，让这些字段为空。否则，可能定位不到文件。
当输入完搜索条件时，勾选想要用于搜索的字段前面的方框 。通过启用或禁用字段，改变搜索的结果。如果没有输入搜索条件，将列出在当前目录中的所有文件。
只有该菜单是可用的，文件过滤器才会激活。如果用户关闭了文件过滤器菜单，这些值重置为默认值（=显示所有）。
关键字 查找包含指定模式（关键字）的所有文件。
隐藏无法访问的文件 选择此框，隐藏当前用户因为权限设置而无法访问的所有文件。
predictions: Zhongwang 3D application
Zhongwang 3D PDM

In the entire lifecycle of the design, ZW3D PDM Manager can search and manage ZW3D object files, as well as other non-ZW3D files, such as word processing, databases, and spreadsheets associated with design projects. It can also use ZW3D PDM Manager to utilize product lifecycle functions (such as check-in, check-out, release, etc.), and set user and group permissions.
Switch between the data database directory and the user directory using the drop-down list in the current directory. Perform file search on the current directory.

File filter Filter the current database directory (or user directory); enter the filter criteria in the file filter dialog box (see below). ZW3D PDM Manager will locate and list the files that match all fields.
The file list lists the results of file search. If no search criteria are entered, all files will be listed.

Revision list Lists the revision history of the selected file. Each revision represents a file listed in the file list. You can select a file from the revision list by selecting a revision level, or view the revision history of a file using this list. Object editing can be performed on the selected file. For more information, see mouse button functions.

Status list This list displays the current status of the selected file (such as: new, check-in, check-out, publish, or discard). It also lists the user and group names and their access permissions for this file. For more information, see modifying the file's publish status and modifying the access permissions for Midas 3D users and groups.
Preview Show a preview of the file here. When using the save file, save as, save all, and save/close file commands, a preview is automatically created.
File list Right-click on a file to display the following object editing functions. Some functions are disabled depending on the current state of the file.
Check in Check out Publish Create new release Discard View file Copy file Delete file

Click the right mouse button on an item in the status list and select 'Modify Status' to display the dialog for modifying file status. Modify the file's status or user and group permissions. For more information, see modifying the release status of files and modifying permissions for midas 3D users and groups.

Use this dialog to filter the file list (see above). If you are viewing a file and know the file name, simply enter the file name field. If you know the file version or username, just enter the corresponding field. If you are unsure, leave these fields blank. Otherwise, the file may not be located.

When the search criteria are entered, check the box in front of the fields you want to use for the search. By enabling or disabling the fields, you can change the search results. If no search criteria are entered, all files in the current directory will be listed.
The file filter will only be activated if this menu is available. If the user closes the file filter menu, these values will be reset to the default (=show all).
Keyword search for all files containing the specified pattern (keyword).
Hide inaccessible files. Select this box to hide all files that the current user cannot access due to permission settings.
reference: ZW3D Applications
ZW3D PDM

With the ZW3D PDM Manager you can search for and manage ZW3D object files and other non-ZW3D files such as word processor, database and spreadsheet tables associated with your design projects throughout their life cycle. You can also perform product life cycle functions (e.g., Check In, Check Out, Release, etc.) and set user and group permissions using the ZW3D PDM Manager.
Current Directory Use the drop-down list to switch between the vault directory and your user directory. File searches will be performed on the current directory.

File Filter To filter the current vault directory (or your user directory); enter the filter criteria in the File Filter Form (see below). The ZW3D PDM Manager will locate and list those files that match all of the fields provided.
File List The results of a file search are listed here. All files are listed if no search criteria are entered.

Revision List The revision history of the selected file is listed here. Each revision represents a file that is listed in the File List. You can select a file from the File List by selecting its revision level from the Revision List. You can also review a files revision history using this list. You can perform Object Editing on selected files. See Mouse Button Functionality for more information.

State List This list shows the current state of the selected file (e.g., New, Checked In, Checked Out, Released or Obsolete). The user and group name and their access level to the file are also listed. See also Changing a File's Release State and Changing ZW3D User and Group Permissions for more information.
Preview The preview of the file is shown here. A preview is automatically created when the Save File, Save File As, Save All Files and Save and Close File commands are used.
File List Right-click on a file to display the following Object Edit functions. Some functions may be disabled depending on the current state of the file.
Check In Check Out Release New Release Obsolete View File Copy File Delete File

State List Right-click on an item and select "Change State" to display the Change File State Form. You can change the state of the file or the user and group permission for the file. See also Changing a File's Release State and Changing ZW3D User and Group Permissions for more information.

Use this form to filter the Files List (see above). If you are just looking a file and you know the file name, complete only the File Name field. If you know the revision level or the user name, complete those fields as well to limit the filtered list. If you're not sure, leave the fields blank. Otherwise, the file may not be located.

When you are done entering the search criteria, put a check in the box next to the fields that you want to search by. You can enable or disable fields to modify the search results. If no search criteria are entered, all files in the current directory are listed.
The File Filter is only active as long as the menu is visible. If the user closes the File Filter menu then the values reset to defaults (= show everything).
Keyword Finds all files that contain the specified pattern (keyword)
Hide inaccessible files Check this box to hide all files which are inaccessible to the current user because of their permission settings.

text: 对于一些复杂的案例，刀具路径计算将是一个耗时的过程，用户需要等待计算完成。但是使用后台计算的方式，用户可以在刀轨计算过程中继续使用ZW3D，完成后只需要点击 后台计算输入 将刀轨导入到相应的操作中即可，这将大大提高工作效率。
提示: 后台计算仅在 3轴快速铣削 工序中有效。
任务: 使用快速铣削后台计算来计算刀具路径。
步骤 01 打开 Batch calculation.Z3 文件并进入CAM空间。
步骤 02 创建 二维偏移粗加工 工序，然后指定刀具和特征。
创建二维偏移粗加工工序
步骤 03 右键单击该工序，然后在右键菜单中单击 后台计算（限于快速铣削）按钮，它会自动弹出 Qm Tracker 对话框，显示计算进度。
后台计算
步骤 04 计算完成后，点击工具栏中的 后台计算输入 按钮将刀具路径导入工序中。
导入刀轨
predictions: For some complex cases, toolpath calculation will be a time-consuming process, and users need to wait for the calculation to complete. However, by using background calculation, users can continue using ZW3D during the toolpath calculation process. After completion, they just need to click on 'Background Calculation Input' to import the toolpath into the corresponding operation, which will greatly improve work efficiency.
Note: Background computation is only valid in 3-axis rapid milling process.
Task: Use fast milling back-end calculation to compute tool path.
Step 01 Open the Batch calculation.Z3 file and enter CAM space.
Step 02 create 2D offset roughing operation, then specify the tool and feature.
Create 2D offset roughing operation

Step 03 Right-click on the operation, then click the Background Calculation (limited to high-speed milling) button in the right-click menu, it will automatically pop up the Qm Tracker dialog box to display the calculation progress.
Background calculation
After the calculation in step 04 is completed, click the 'Background Calculation Input' button in the toolbar to import the tool path into the operation.
Import tool path
reference: For some complicated cases, toolpaths calculation will be a time-consuming process and users need to wait until the calculation is completed. But with batch calculation method, users can continue to work with ZW3D during the toolpaths calculation and just need to import to the corresponding operation when it is done, which will significantly improve the work efficiency.
Tips: The batch calculation is only valid in QuickMill operations.
Task: Calculate toolpaths with Quick Mill Batch calculation
STEP 01 Open Batch calculation.Z3 file and go to CAM space.
STEP 02 Create an Offset 2D roughing operation, then specify the tool and features.
Create offset 2D operation
STEP 03 Right-click the operation then click Bath Calculate in the context menu, it will automatically pop up the Qm Tracker dialog box to show the calculation progress.
Batch Calculate
STEP 04 When the calculation is completed, import the toolpaths into operation.
Import toolpaths

text: 三维几何形体通常有两种类型，一种是实体类型，一种是曲面类型，在中望3D内部是根据这个形体是否封闭来区分这两种类型。中望3D提供了独特的混合建模方法，可以让用户在实体和曲面之间自由的切换，如下图所示，当删除实体的一个面时，将自动变成曲面类型。
实体与曲面类型
predictions: Three-dimensional geometric shapes usually have two types, one is solid type, and the other is surface type. In ZW3D, these two types are distinguished based on whether the shape is closed. ZW3D provides a unique hybrid modeling method that allows users to freely switch between solid and surface types. As shown in the figure below, when deleting a face of a solid, it will automatically become a surface type.
Entity and surface types
reference: There are two types of shapes: solids and surfaces. In ZW3D, a closed geometry is considered a solid, otherwise, it is a surface, as shown in Figure 91. The unique modeling method of ZW3D, hybrid modeling, allows you to switch between solids and surfaces freely. It means that if a shape is geometrically closed, it will be automatically filled and regarded a solid.
Solid Shape and Surface Shape

text: 直接编辑工具栏 -> 修改 -> DE面偏移
使用该命令偏移一个或多个面。在偏移操作中，为闭合空隙或解决相交面，将延伸或修剪面。
DE面偏移
侧面： 如果选择“不创建”，将炸开边，偏移面，并且结果将是不连贯的面或造型。如果选择“创建”，所有边界边将重新计算，如需要将创建侧面。
相交： 设计者使用该选择移除自相交的面。
DE面偏移
predictions: Direct editing toolbar -> Modify -> Offset the DE face
Use this command to offset one or more faces. In the offset operation, extend or trim faces to close gaps or resolve intersecting faces.
Offset DE face

Side: If 'Do not create' is selected, the edges will be exploded, the offset face will be created, and the result will be a discontinuous face or shape. If 'Create' is selected, all boundary edges will be recalculated, and the side face will be created if necessary.
Intersect: Designers use this selection to remove self-intersecting faces.
Offset DE face
reference: Direct Edit Ribbon Tab -> Modify ->DE Face Offset
This command is used for offsetting one or more faces. It will extend or trim faces as needed during the offset operation to close gaps and resolve intersections.
DE Face Offset

Side faces: If Do not create is checked, the edges will be exploded and the face will offset and the result will be a disconnected face or shape. If Create is checked, then all bounding edges will be recomputed and the side faces will be created where required.
Intersections: Designers can use this option to remove the self-intersecting faces.
DE Face Offset

text: STEP 01 从“工具”功能区选项卡调用“方程式管理器”，并定义所需的变量。例如，要将变量M的值指定为8mm，只需选择长度作为类型，输入M作为名称，输入8作为表达式。然后，单击并应用。
方程式管理器
STEP 02在变量管理器中输入所需的变量，然后单击应用，如图11所示。所有定义的变量都记录在历史管理器中。
注意：通常有4种类型的表达式：长度、角度、常量和字符串。至于常数，通常它们的值是0、1和2，它们用于条件抑制。
输入所需的变量
predictions: STEP 01 Call the 'Equation Manager' from the 'Tools' functional area tab, and define the required variables. For example, to specify the value of variable M as 8mm, simply select length as the type, enter M as the name, and enter 8 as the expression. Then, click and apply.
Equation Manager
Enter the required variables in the variable manager in STEP 02, then click apply, as shown in Figure 11. All defined variables are recorded in the history manager.
Note: There are usually 4 types of expressions: length, angle, constant, and string. As for constants, their values are usually 0, 1, and 2, and they are used for conditional suppression.
Enter the required variables
reference: STEP 01 Invoke the Equation Manager from the Tools Ribbon Tab and define the needed variables. For example, to specify the value of the variable M to be 8mm, just select Length as the Type and input M as the Name and 8 as the Expression. Then, click  and Apply.
Equation Manager
STEP 02 Input the needed variables in the Equation Manager and click Apply, as shown in Figure 11. All the defined variables are recorded in the History Manager.
Note: Generally, there are 4 types of expressions: Length, Angle, Constant, and String. As for constants, normally, their values are 0, 1, and 2, and they are used for conditional suppress.
Inputting the Needed Variables
